div.head: {left margin} Bárbara
{left margin} María Antonia
div.p: On the fifth day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils on the following individuals: . . . Also, Bárbara, adult woman of a gentile nation. Her godfather was Lorenzo Panadero. Also, María Antonia, adult woman of a gentile nation. Her godfather was Miguel Iullapuñu, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Bárbara
{left margin} María Asenciana
div.p: On the thirtieth day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils on the following individuals: Bárbara, adult woman of a gentile nation. The godparents were Gregory Chiguigui and María Quedap[ILL] María Asenciana, legitimate daughter of José Justo and Antonia de Jojola. Her godparents were Carlos and Agustina, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonio
div.p: On the ninth day of the month of July of the year seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils on Antonio, legitimate son of Antonio Gurulé and Teresa Gallegos. Her godparents were Bernabé Baca and Margarita Mata, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonia
div.p: On the fourteenth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils on Antonia, Jumana, an adult woman. Her godparents were Don Antonio de Chávez and Doña Antonia Baca, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Barbara
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fifteenth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized Bárbara, Apache. Her godmother was Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan Pedro
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the sixteenth day of the month of October of the year one thousand and thirty: I solemnly baptized Juan Pedro, legitimate child of Raymundo Jojola and Francisca. His godparents were Captain Juan González and Doña María López, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Gertrudis
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fourth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized Gertrudis, Apache. Her godmother was Doña Gertrudis, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Catalina
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the sixth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty: I solemnly baptized Catalina, Apache. Her godfather was Felipe Gallegos, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} José
div.p: In this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the third day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-one: I solemnly baptized José, Apache. His godfather was José Norey, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan Isidro
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-ninth day of the month of March of the year one thousand and thirty-two: I solemnly baptized Juan Isidro, legitimate son of Sebastián and Quiteria. His godparents were Juanico and Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Pedro
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the first of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-two: I solemnly baptized Pedro, son of unknown parents. His godparents were José Mariano and Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María Antonia
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the seventh day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-two: I solemnly baptized María Antonia, Apache. Her godparents were Juan and María Antonia, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Carlos
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-sixth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-two: I solemnly baptized Carlos, son of gentile parents. His godparents were José Mariano and Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Miguel
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-sixth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-two: I solemnly baptized Miguel, son of gentile parents. His godfather was Miguel, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Santiago
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twentieth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-two: I baptized and placed the holy oils on Santiago, Apache. His godfather was Javier, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María de la Concepción
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-fifth day of the month of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized María de la Concepción, legitimate daughter of José, the Jumano Indian, and Angelina. Her godparents were Francisco and María la Guchuquiana, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan Ambrosio
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the second day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized Juan Ambrosio, son of unknown parents. His godparents were Matías and Juana, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María Dorotea
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twentieth day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized María Dorotea, legitimate daughter of Raymundo Jojola and Francisca. Her godparents were Matías and Juana, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-seventh day of the month of May of the yar one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized María in extreme unction, daughter of unknown parents. Her godmother was Micaela, and I signed it for the record, ut supra.

div.head: {left margin} Bárbara
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the thirty-first day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I baptized Bárbara in extreme need, Apache. Her godmother was María, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan de la Cruz
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twentieth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized Juan de la Cruz, son of unknown parents. His godparents were Captain Juan González and Doña María López, and I signed it for the record, ut supra.

div.head: {left margin} Antonia
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-seventh day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I baptized and placed the holy oils on Antonia, Apache. Her godfather was Antonio Montoya, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María Josefa
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fourteenth day of the month of February of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-four: I solemnly baptized María Josefa, Apache. Her godparents were Juanico and Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Tomás
div.p: On the eighteenth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-five: I solemnly baptized Tomás de Villanueva, legitimate son of José Fernández and Angelina. His godparents were Felipe Romero and Francisca Góngora, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} Manuela
div.p: With permission of the parish priest on the twenty-ninth of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three: I solemnly baptized Manuela, an adult Apache woman. Her godmother was María, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María de los Dolores
div.p: On the eighth day of the month of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six: I solemnly baptized María de los Dolores, legitimate daughter of Raymundo Jojola and Francisca. The godparents were José Romero and Doña Ana de Chávez, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} María Josefa
div.p: On the twenty-second day of the month of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six: I solemnly baptized María Josefa, daughter of unknown parents. Her godmother was Agustina Jojola, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} Juan Isidro
div.p: On the fourteenth day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six: I solemnly baptized Juan Isidro, legitimate son of Bonifacio [Lucero?] and Bárbara Feliciano. The godparents were José [Norcí?] and Micaela Montoya, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} María
div.p: On the twenty-fifth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six: I baptized and placed the holy oils on María, Apache. Her godmother was Juana María, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Agustín
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the eighth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six: I solemnly baptized Agustín, Apache. His godparent was Micaela, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} José Antonio
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-fourth day of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I solemnly baptized José Antonio, legitimate son of Ana and Ventura. His godparents were Gerónimo Jirón and Damiana, and
I signed it for the record, as stated above.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}

div.head: {left margin} Antonio
div.p: At Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-second day of the month of June of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: With permission of the parish priest, I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils and chrism on Antonio, coyote, son of unknown parents. His godmother was María Jémez, and I signed it for the record at said mission on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} María de la Asención
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fifth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I put holy water on María de la Asención, Apache, due to her extreme need. Her godparent was Rosa Holguín, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Santiago
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-sixth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I solemnly baptized Santiago, legitimate son of Sebastián and Quiteria. The godparent was María la Guchiquiana, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan Antonio
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the sixth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I put holy water on Juan Antonio, Apache, due to extreme need. His godparent was Rosa de Holguín, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonia
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fourth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I solemnly baptized Antonia, Apache. Her godfather was Antonio, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Agustina and Catarina, Apaches
div.p: At the town and Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the eighth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven: I solemnly baptized and placed the holy oils and chrism on Agustina, adult Apache woman, whose godmother was Gertrudis de Peralta, and Catarina, also an adult Apache woman, whose godmother was Catarina, and I signed it for the record at said town and mission on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} Catalina
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the second day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Catalina, Apache. Her godmother was Juana María, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonia
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the second day of August of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Antonia, Apache. Her godfather was Lorenzo, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Tomás
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twentieth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Tomás, legitimate son of Raymundo Jojola and Francisca. His godparents were Diego Domingo and Doña Juana de Chávez, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juan José
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fifth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Juan José, son of unknown parents. His godparent was Doña Isabel Baca, and I signed it
for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Maria Rosaura
div.p: On the nineteenth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized María Rosaura, legitimate daughter of Antonio and María, Comanches. Her godparents were Ventura and Jacinta Baca, and I signed it for the record, ut supra.

div.head: {left margin} Crisóstomo
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the seventh day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Juan Crisóstomo, legitimate son of Francisco Caraquis and María. His godparents were Salvador and María, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Maria, Juan Antonio, Cristóbal, Juan, Josefa
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the seventeenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized the following individuals: María, Juan Antonio, Cristóbal, Juan, Josefa, all Apaches. The godfather for all of them was Antonio de Ulibarrí, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Jacinta Úrsula
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the nineteenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: I solemnly baptized Jacinta Úrsula, legitimate daughter of Bonifacio and Bárbara. Her godparents were Raymundo and Francisca, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Bárbara Antonia
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the seventh day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine: I solemnly baptized Bárbara Antonia, Apache. Her godmother was Catalina Jémez and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Ana María
{left margin} Bárbara
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-eighth day of the month of March: I solemnly baptized Ana María, Apache. Her godmother was Isabel. Also, I baptized Bárbara, Apache. Her godmother was María Francisca, and I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonio de la Trinidad
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-fourth of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine: I solemnly baptized Antonio de la Trinidad, Apache. His godfather was Francisco. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Santiago, Apache infant
div.p: On the eighth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine: With permission of the parish priest, I solemnly baptized Santiago, Apache infant. His godfather was Tadeo de Torres, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} Antonia Barbara, Apache infant
div.p: On the eighth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight: With the permission of the parish priest, I solemnly baptized Antonia Bárbara, an infant girl of the Apache nation, the daughter of infidel parents. Her godfather was José Nevárez, and I signed it for the record on said day, month, and year.

div.head: {left margin} María Tomasa
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the tenth of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine: I solemnly baptized María Tomasa, legitimate daughter of Ventura and Jacinta. Her godparents were Carlos and Catalina Jémez. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Asencio Mariano
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twelfth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine: I solemnly baptized Asencio Mariano, legitimate son of Antonio and Pascuala, Indians. His godparents were Bernardo de Chávez and María Montoya. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Antonio Pascual
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-fourth of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty: I solemnly baptized Antonio Pascual, legitimate son of Sebastián and Quiteria. The godparents were Antonio and María la Chata. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Juana María
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the fourth day of the month of February of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized Juana María, legitimate daughter of Raymundo Jojola and Francisca. Her godparents were Juan [Dirujan?] and María. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Rosa María
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the tenth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized Rosa María, legitimate daughter of Brianda and Bernardo. Her godparents were Luis Chávez and La Aguilara. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Quiteria
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the eleventh day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized Quiteria, legitimate daughter of Ventura and Ana. Her godparents were Diego Padilla and María Luisa. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} Rosa
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the thirtieth day of the month of August of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized Rosa, an Apache woman (it had been twenty years since Doña Isabel Chávez had holy water placed on her, but the other ceremonies that our Holy Mother Church orders had not taken place). Her godmother was María la Guchuquiana. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {left margin} María de los Dolores, coyota
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the nineteenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized María de los Dolores, legitimate daughter of Quintana and Petrona, coyotes. Her godparents were Cayetano Torres and María Góngora. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

div.head: {margin} María Juliana
div.p: At this Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta on the twenty-sixth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one: I solemnly baptized María Juliana, legitimate daughter of Ventura and Jacinta. Her godmother was Micaela. I signed it for the record, as stated above.

place.placeName: Mission of San Agustín de la Isleta

event.desc: Baptism attended by María de la Concepción, José, Angelina, Francisco, María la Guchuquiana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan Ambrosio, Matías, Juana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twentieth day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Dorotea, Raymundo Jojola, Francisca, Matías, Juana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-seventh day of the month of May of the yar one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by María, Micaela, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the thirty-first day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by Bárbara, María, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twentieth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan de la Cruz, Juan González, Doña María López, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-seventh day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonia, Antonio Montoya, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the fourteenth day of the month of February of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-four
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Josefa, Juanico, Micaela, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eighteenth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-five
event.desc: Baptism attended by Tomás de Villanueva, José Fernández, Angelina, Felipe Romero, Francisca Góngora, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the twenty-ninth of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-three
event.desc: Baptism attended by Manuela, María, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eighth day of the month of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six
event.desc: Baptism attended by María de los Dolores, Raymundo Jojola, Francisca, José Romero, Doña Ana de Chávez, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the twenty-second day of the month of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Josefa, Agustina Jojola, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the fourteenth day of the month of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan Isidro, Bonifacio [Lucero?], Bárbara Feliciano, José [Norcí?], Micaela Montoya, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the twenty-fifth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six
event.desc: Baptism attended by María, Juana María, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eighth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-six
event.desc: Baptism attended by Agustín, Micaela, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-fourth day of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by José Antonio, Ana, Ventura, Gerónimo Jirón, Damiana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-second day of the month of June of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonio, María Jémez, Fray Juan José de Oronzoro

event.when: the fifth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by María de la Asención, Rosa Holguín, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-sixth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by Santiago, Sebastián, Quiteria, María la Guchiquiana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the sixth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan Antonio, Rosa de Holguín, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the fourth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonia, Antonio, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eighth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-seven
event.desc: Baptism attended by Agustina, Gertrudis de Peralta, Catarina, Fray Juan José de Oronzoro

event.when: the second day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Catalina, Juana María, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the second day of August of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonia, Lorenzo, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twentieth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Tomás, Raymundo Jojola, Francisca, Diego Domingo, Doña Juana de Chávez, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the fifth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan José, Doña Isabel Baca, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the nineteenth day of the month of October of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Rosaura, Antonio, María, Ventura, Jacinta Baca, Fray José Mariano López

event.when: the seventh day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juan Crisóstomo, Francisco Caraquis, María, Salvador, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the seventeenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by María, Juan Antonio, Cristóbal, Juan, Josefa, Antonio de Ulibarrí, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the nineteenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Jacinta Úrsula, Bonifacio, Bárbara, Raymundo, Francisca, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the seventh day of the month of March of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine
event.desc: Baptism attended by Bárbara Antonia, Catalina Jémez, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-eighth day of the month of March
event.desc: Baptism attended by Ana María, Isabel, Bárbara, María Francisca, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-fourth of May of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonio de la Trinidad, Francisco, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eighth day of the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine
event.desc: Baptism attended by Santiago, Tadeo de Torres, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the month of September of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-eight
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonia Bárbara, José Nevárez, Fray Manuel Zambrano

event.when: the tenth of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Tomasa, Ventura, Jacinta, Carlos, Catalina Jémez, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: he twelfth day of the month of December of the year one thousand seven hundred and thirty-nine
event.desc: Baptism attended by Asencio Mariano, Antonio, Pascuala, Bernardo de Chávez, María Montoya, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-fourth of April of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty
event.desc: Baptism attended by Antonio Pascual, Sebastián, Quiteria, Antonio, María la Chata, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the fourth day of the month of February of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by Juana María, Raymundo Jojola, Francisca, Juan [Dirujan?], María, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the tenth day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by Rosa María, Brianda, Bernardo, Luis Chávez, La Aguilara, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the eleventh day of the month of July of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by Quiteria, Ventura, Ana, Diego Padilla, María Luisa, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the thirtieth day of the month of August of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by Rosa, Doña Isabel Chávez, María la Guchuquiana, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the nineteenth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by María de los Dolores, Quintana, Petrona, Cayetano Torres, María Góngora, Fray Carlos Delgado

event.when: the twenty-sixth day of the month of November of the year one thousand seven hundred and forty-one
event.desc: Baptism attended by María Juliana, Ventura, Jacinta, Micaela, Fray Carlos Delgado

surface.line: {left margin} Barbara
{left margin} Maria An[*toni]a
En sinco dias de el mes de marzo de mill
setesçientos y treinta años baptiçe solem-
nemente y puse los santos oleos a los sigui-
entes . . . yten a Barbara adulta de nacion
gentil fue su padrino Lorenzo Panadero item
a Maria Antonio adulta de nacion gentil
fue su padrino Miguel Iullapuñu y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Pedro Montaño {rubric}
{left margin} Barbara
{left margin} Maria Ascenciana
En treinta dias de el mes de marzo de mill
setecientos y treinta años baptice solennemente
y puse los santos oleos a las siguientes a Barba-
ra adulta de nacion gentil fueron sus padri-
nos Gregorio Chiguigui y Maria quedap[ILL]
[ILL] a Maria Ascenciana hija legitima de
Joseph Justo y de Antonia de Jojola fueron sus
padrinos Carlos y Augustina y para que con-
te lo firme ut supra.
Fray Pedro Montaño {rubric}
{left margin} Antonio
En nuebe dias de el mes de julio de mill
setecientos y treinta años baptice solenne-
mente y puse los santos oleos a Antonio hijo legiti-
mo de Antonio Grole? y de Theresa Galle-
gos fueron sus padrinos Bernabe Baca
y Margarita Mata y para que conste lo-
firme ut supra.
Fray Pedro Montano {rubric}
{left margin} Antonia
En catorse dias de el mes de julio de mill
setecientos y treinta años baptice solemne-
mente y puse los santos oleos a Antonia de na-
cion jumana adulta fueron sus padri-
nos don Antonio de Chabes y dona Antonia Ba-
ca y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Pedro Montano {rubric}
{left margin} Barbara
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en quince
dias del mes de octubre de mil setecientos y treinta años
baptise solemnemente a Barbara apacha de nacion
fue su madrina Micaela y para que conste lo firme ut
supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Pedro
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
diez y seis de octubre de mil setecientos y treinta
años baptise solemnemente a Juan Pedro hi-
jo legitimo de Raymundo Jogola y de Francisca
fueron sus padrinos el capitan Juan Gonzales y do-
ña Maria Lopez y para que conste lo firme ut su-
pra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Gertrudes
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en quatro
dias del mes de diciembre de mil setecientos y treinta años
baptise solemnemente a Gertrudes apacha de nacion
fue su madrina doña Gertrudes y para que conste lo firme
ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado (rubric}
{left margin} Cathalina
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en seis
dias del mes de diciembre de mil setecientos y treinta
años baptise solemnemente a Cathalina apacha
de nacion fue su padrino Felipe Gallegos y para que
conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Joseph
En esta Mission de San Agustin de la Ysleta en tres dias del
mes de mayo de mil setecientos y treinta y un años baptise
solemnemente a Joseph apache de nacion fue padrino
Joseph Norey y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Ysidro
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Yselta
en veinte y nuebe dias del mes de marzo de mil seteci-
entos y treinta y dos años baptise solemnemente
a Juan Ysidro hijo legitimo de Sebastian y de
Quiteria fueron sus padrinos Juanico y Micaela
y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Pedro
En esta Mission de San Agustin de la Ysleta en primero
de julio de mil setecientos y treinta y dos años baptise so-
lemnemente a Pedro hijo de padres no conosidos fue-
ron sus padrinos Joseph Mariano y Micaela y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Antonia
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
siete dias del mes de septiembre de mil setecientos y
treinta y dos años baptise solemnemente a Maria
Antonia (apacha de nacion) fueron sus padrinos
Juan y Maria Antonia y para que conste lo firme ut
supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Carlos
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en vein-
te y seis dias del mes de septembre de mil setecientos y treinta
y dos años baptise solemnemente a Carlos hijo del pa-
dres infieles fueron sus padrinos Joseph Mariano y
Micaela y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Miguel
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta
en veinte y siete dias del mes de septiembre de mil setecien-
tos y treinta y dos años baptise solemnemente a
Miguel hijo de padres de infieles fue su padrino Mi-
guel y para conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Santiago
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
veinte dias del mes de diciembre de mil seteçientos
y treinta y dos años baptise y puse los santos olios
a Santiago apache de nacion fue su padrino Xa-
bier y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria de la Concesion
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en vein-
te y cinco dias del mes de abril de mil setecientos y treinta
y tres años baptise solemnemente a Maria de la Con-
cepsion hija lejitima de Joseph el Juman y de Angeli-
na fueron sus padrinos Francisco y Maria La Guchuquiana y
para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Anbrosio
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en dos di-
as del mes de mayo de mil setecientos y treinta y tres años
baptise solemnemente a Juan Ambrosio hijo de pa-
dres no conosidos fueron sus padrinos Mathias y Juana
y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Dorotea
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en viente
dias del mes de mayo de mil setecientos y treinta y tres años
baptise solemnemente a Maria Dorotea hija legiti-
ma de Raymundo Jojola y de Francisca fueron sus pa-
drinos Mathias y Juana y para que conste lo firme
ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en vein-
te y ciete dias del mes de mayo de mil setecientos y treinta
y tres años baptise en extrema a Maria hija de padres
no conosidos fue su madrina Micaela y para que
conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Barbara
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en tre-
inta y un dias del mes de mayo de mil setecientos y tre-
inta y tres años baptise en extrema necesidad a Bar-
bara apacha de nacion fue su madrina Maria y
para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan de la Cruz
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
veinte dias del mes de julio de mil setecientos y treinta y
tres años baptise solemnemente a Juan de la Cruz
hijo de padres no conocidos fueron sus padrinos el ca-
pitan Juan Gonzales y doña Maria Lopez y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Antonia
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en veinte y (si)
siete dias del mes de julio de mil setecientos y treinta y tres
años baptise y puse los santos olios a Antonia (apac-
ha de nacion) fue su padrino Antonio Montoya y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Getrudes
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en dos dias
del mes de agosto de mil seteçientos y treinta y tres años bap-
tise solemnemente a Getrudes (apache de naçion) fue su
madrina doña Bernarda Baca y para que conste
lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Jusepa
En esta mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en-
catorze dias del mes de febrero de mil seteçientos y trein-
ta y quatro años baptise solemnemente a Maria
Jusepa apacha de nacion fueron sus padrinos Jua-
nico y Micaela y para que conste los firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Thomas
En dies y ocho dias del mes de septiembre en mil setecientos y treinta y sinco
años baptise solemnemente a Thomas de Villanueba hijo legitimo de Joseph
Fernandes y de Angelina fueron sus padrinos Phelipe Romero y Francisca Gongora y por que conste lo firme en dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Manuela
De licensia parrochi en veinte y nuebe de marzo
de mil setecientos y treinta y seis años bapise solem-
nemente a Manuela adulta y apacha de naçion
fue su madrina Maria y para que conste lo
firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria de los Dolores
En ocho dias del mes de abril de mil setecientos treinta y sies años baptise solemnemente a
Maria de los Dolores hija lexitima de Raimundo Joxola y de Fransisca fueron padrinos Joseph
Romero y doña Ana de Chabes y por que conste lo firme en dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Josepha
En veinte y dos dias del mes de abril de mil setecientos y treinta y seis años baptise solemne-
mente a Maria Josepha hija de padres no conosidos fue su madrina Agustina Jojola y por
que conste lo firme en dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Ysidro
En catorse dias del mes de mayo de mil setecientos y trienta y seis años baptise
solemnemente a Juan Ysidro hijo lexitimo de Bonifacio [Lussero?] y de Barbara Felisi-
ano fueron sue padrinos Joseph [Norci?] y Michaela Montoya y por que conste lo firme en
dicho dia mes y ano.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Maria
En veinte y sinco dias del mes de noviembre de mil seteci-
entos y treinta y seis años baptise y puse los santos
olios a Maria apacha de nacion fue su madrina
Juana Maria y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Agustin
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en ocho
dias del mes de diciembre de mil setecientos y treinta y seis años
baptise solemnemente a Augustin (apache de nacion)
fue padrino Micaela y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Joseph Antonio
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
veinte y quatro de marzo de mil setecientos y treinta
y siete años baptise solemnemente a Joseph Antonio
hijo legitimo de Ana y de Bentura fueron sus pa-
drinos Geronimo Jiron y Damiana y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Antonio
En la Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en veynte y un dias del
mes de junio de el año de mil setecientos y treynta y siete (venia parro-
chi] baptise solemnemente y puse los santos oleos y chrysma a Antonio collo-
te hijo de padres no conocidos fue su madrina Maria Xemes y para que
conste lo firme en dicha mission dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Juan Joseph de Oronzoro {rubric}
{left margin} Maria de la Assencion
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en sinco
dias del mes de julio de mil setecientos y treinta y sie-
te años le eche el agua en estrema necesidad a Maria
de la Assension apacha de nacion fue padrino Roza
de Olgin y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Santiago
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en veinte
y seis dias del mes de julio de mil setecientos y treinta y siete
años baptise solemnemente a Santiago hijo legitimo
de Sebastian y de Quiteria fue padrino Maria la Guchi-
quiana y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Antonio
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
seis dias del mes de septimbre de mil setecientos y treinta y sie-
te años le eche el agua a Juan Antonio (en estrema) apa-
che de nacion y fue padrino Rosa de Olgin y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Antonia
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en qua-
tro dias del mes de octubre de mil setecientos y treinta
y siete años baptise solemnemente a Antonia
apacha de nacion fue padrino Antonio y para que
conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Augustina y Catharina apachas
En el pueblo y Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en ocho dias del mes de
noviembre de el año de mil setecientos y treynta y siete baptise solemnemente y puse los
santos oleo y chrysma a Agustina adulta apacha fue su madrina Gertrudis
de Peralta y a Catharina tambien apacha adulta y fue su madrina Catharina y pa-
ra que conste lo firme en dicho pueblo y mission dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Juan Joseph de Oronzoro {rubric}
{left margin} Cathalina
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en dos
dias del mes de marzo de mil setecientos y treinta y
ocho años baptise solemnemente a Cathalina
(apacha de nacion) fue su madrina Juana Maria
y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric]
{left margin} Antonia
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en dos
dias del mes de agosto de mil setecientos y treinta y
ocho años baptise solemnemente a Antonia (apa-
cha de nacion) fue su padrino Lorenço y para que
conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Thomas
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
veinte dias del mes de septiembre de mil setecientos y tre-
inta y ocho años baptise solemnemente a Thomas
hijo legitimo de Raymundo Jogola y de Francisca
fueron sus padrinos Diego Domingo y doña Jua-
na de Chaves y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juan Joseph
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
sinco dias del mes de octubre de mil setecientos y tre-
inta y ocho años baptise solemnemente a Juan
Joseph hijo de padres no conocidos fue su padrino
doña Ysabel Baca y para que conste
lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Mari(n)a Rosaura
En dies y nueve de octubre de setesientos y treinta y ocho
babtise solemnemente a Maria Rosaura hija lexitima de
Antonio y Maria cumanches de nasion fueron sus padri-
nos Bentura y Jasinta Baca y por que conste lo firme
ut supra.
Fray Joseph Mariano Lopez {rubric}
{left margin} Crissotono
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
siete dias del mes de noviembre de mil seteçientos y treinta
y ocho años baptise solemnemente a Juan Crisos-
tomo hijo legitimo de Francisco Caraquis y de Maria
fueron sus padrinos Salvador y Maria y para
que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Juan Antonio Cristoval Juan Josepha
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta
en dies y siete dias del mes de noviembre de mil setecien-
tos y treinta y ocho años baptise solemnemente
a los siguientes Maria Juan Antonio Cristoval Juan
Josepha (apaches de nacion) fue su padrino de to-
dos Antonio de Uribarri y para que conste lo firme
ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Jasinta Ursula
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
diez y nuebe dias del mes de noviembre de mil seteçientos
y treinta y ocho años baptise solemnemente a Ja-
sinta Ursula hija legitima de Bonifacio y de Bar-
bara fueron sus padrinos Raymundo y Francisca
y para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Barbara Antonia
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
siete dias del mes de marzo de mil setecientos y treinta
y nuebe años baptise solemnemente a Barba-
ra Antonia (apacha de nacion) fue su madrina
Chatalina jemes y para que conste lo firme ut
supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Ana Maria
{left margin} Barbara
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en veinte
y ocho dias del mes the marzo baptise solemnemente
a Ana Maria (apacha de nacion) fue su madrina
Ysabel ytem a Barbara (apacha de nacion) fue
su madrina Maria Francisca para que conste lo
firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Antonio de la Trinidad
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysle-
ta en veinte y quatro de mayo de mil setecientos y
treinta y nuebe años baptise solemnemente a Antonio
de la Trinidad (apache de nacion) fue padrino
Francisco para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Santiago parbulo apache
En ocho dias del mes de septiembre de mil setecientos
y treinta y nuebe años (de lisentia parrochi) baptise
solemnemente a Santiago de nacion apache parbulo
fue su padrino Thadio de Torres y porque conste lo firme
en dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Antonia Barbara parbula apacha
En ocho dias del mes de septiembre de mil setecientos y treinta y
nuebe años (de lisentia parrochi) baptise solemnemente a
Antonia Barbara parbula de nacion apacha hija de padres in-
fieles fue su padrino Joseph Nevares y por que conste lo firme
en dicho dia mes y año.
Fray Manuel Zambrano {rubric}
{left margin} Maria Thomasa
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta di-
ez del mes de noviembre de mil setecientos y treinta y
nuebe años baptise solemnemente a Maria Thoma-
sa hija legitima de Ventura y de Jacinta fueron sus
padrinos Carlos y Chatalina gemes para que conste
lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Assensio Mariano
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en
doze dias del mes de diciembre de mil seteçientos y treinta y nue-
be años baptise solemnemente a Assensio Mariano
hijo legitimo de Antonio y de Pascuala indios fueron
sus padrinos Bernardo de Chavez y Maria Montoya
para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Antonio Pasqual
En esta Mission de San Agustin de la Ysleta en veinte
y quatro de abril de mil seteçientos y quarenta años bapti-
se solemnemente a Antonio Pasqual hijo legitimo de
Sebastian y de Quiteria fueron padrinos Antonio y Ma-
ria la Chata para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Juana Maria
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en qua-
tro dias del mes de febrero de mil seteçientos y quarenta
y un años baptise solemnemente a Juana Maria hija
legitima de Raymundo Jojola y de Francisca fueron sus
padrinos Juan [Dirujan?] y Maria para que conste lo
firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Roza Maria
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en diez dias del
mes de julio de mil seteçientos y quarenta y un años baptise
solemnemente a Roza Maria hija legitima de Brianda
y de Bernardo fueron sus padrinos Luiz Chaves y la Agui-
lara para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Quiteria
En esta Mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en on-
ze dias del mes de julio de mil seteçientos y quarenta y un
años baptise solemnemente a Quiteria hija legitima
de Ventura y de Ana fueron sus padrinos Diego Padilla
y Maria Luiza para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Rosa
En esta Mission de San Agustin de la Ysleta en treinta
dias del mes de agosto de mil seteçientos y quarenta
y un años baptise solemnemente a Rosa Apacha
(pues abiendo veinte años que doña Ysabel Chaves le e-
cho el agua por omission de sus amos le faltaba las demas
ceremonias que ordena Nuestra Santa Madre de la Yglesia) fue
su madrina Maria La Guchuquiana para que conste lo
firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{left margin} Maria de los Dolores coyota
En esta mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta en dies
y nuebe dias del mes de noviembre de mil seteçientos y quarenta y
un años baptise solemnemente a Maria de los Dolores
hija legitima de Quintana y de Petrona coyotes fueron
sus padrinos Cayetano Torres y Maria Gongora para que
conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
{margin} Maria Juliana
En esta mission de San Augustin de la Ysleta vein-
te y seis dias del mes de noviembre seteçientos y quarenta
y un años baptise solemnemente a Maria Juliana
hija legitima de Ventura y de Jasinta fue su madrina
Micaela para que conste lo firme ut supra.
Fray Carlos Delgado {rubric}
